testcase.classname: Login Functionality for Opencart E-commerce Website
testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered a valid username and password..........................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should be logged in successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Login Functionality for Opencart E-commerce Website
testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered invalid "abc" and "xxyz"...............................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should see error message indicating "Warning: No match for name and password".passed

testcase.classname: Login Functionality for Opencart E-commerce Website
testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered invalid "c@gmail.com" and "abc"........................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should see error message indicating "Warning: No match for name and password".passed

testcase.classname: Login Functionality for Opencart E-commerce Website
testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Opencart login page.......................................passed Given I have entered invalid "wrong" and "iiid".............................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then I should see error message indicating "Warning: No match for name and password".passed

testcase.classname: Login Functionality for Opencart E-commerce Website
testcase.name: Navigating to the forgotten password page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Opencart login page.......................................passed When I click on the Forgotten Password link.................................passed Then I should be redirected to the password reset page......................passed
